background: 'rgba(0, 188, 212, 0.1)', border: '1px solid rgba(0, 188, 212, 0.4)', borderRadius: '999px', padding: '0.5rem 1rem', fontSize: '0.85rem', fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#00e5ff' }, 1fr))', gap: '1.75rem' }, fullWidthCard: { gridColumn: '1 / -1' }, card: { background: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06)', borderRadius: '18px', padding: '1.5rem 2rem', border: '1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08)', backdropFilter: 'blur(18px)', boxShadow: '0 18px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4)', textAlign: 'left' }, cardHeader: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '0.6rem', marginBottom: '0.75rem' }, cardTitle: { fontSize: '1.3rem', fontWeight: '700', margin: 0 }, cardPill: { fontSize: '0.75rem', padding: '0.15rem 0.6rem', borderRadius: '999px', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.25)', color: '#cccccc' }, text: { fontSize: '0.98rem', color: '#e0e0e0', lineHeight: '1.6', marginBottom: '0.75rem', paddingLeft: '0.5rem' }, list: { paddingLeft: '1.75rem', margin: 0, color: '#e0e0e0', fontSize: '0.98rem', lineHeight: '1.6' }, listItem: { marginBottom: '0.35rem' }, questionIntro: { fontSize: '0.98rem', color: '#e0e0e0', lineHeight: '1.6', marginTop: '0.5rem', marginBottom: '0.25rem', paddingLeft: '0.5rem' }, questionList: { paddingLeft: '1.75rem', margin: '0.5rem 0 0', fontSize: '0.98rem', color: '#e0e0e0', lineHeight: '1.6' } }; return (
{/* Navigation */}
CyberSlayers
  • Home
  • About Us
  • Games
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Header */}

Welcome to CyberSlayers

Learn more about our mission, what we teach, and the team behind the adventure.

Interactive Cybersecurity for Ages 8–16
Story-Driven Digital Safety
{/* Grid of Sections */}
{/* Intro / Overview */}

What Is CyberSlayers?

Overview

CyberSlayers is an interactive learning platform designed to teach cybersecurity skills to children ages 8–16 through immersive adventures, story-driven missions, and engaging mini-games. Our goal is to empower the next generation of digital explorers to recognize online risks, think critically, and build safe lifelong digital habits.

{/* Our Mission */}

Our Mission

We believe that cybersecurity shouldn't be taught through fear or restriction — it should be exciting, empowering, and accessible. CyberSlayers transform complex cybersecurity concepts into interactive challenges that build independence, confidence, and digital resilience.

{/* What We Teach */}

What We Teach

Through story-based lessons and game worlds inspired by popular genres, CyberSlayers helps children learn how to:

  • Manage and protect their digital footprint
  • Recognize fake profiles, bots, and impersonation
  • Identify suspicious links, scams, and malicious websites
  • Practice safe browsing on public Wi-Fi or shared networks
  • Understand cybersecurity consequences in a safe, simulated environment
  • Apply digital safety habits in real-world, everyday situations
{/* How It Works */}

How CyberSlayers Works

Our platform blends structured learning with gameplay to maximize engagement and retention:

  • Story-Driven Lessons: A guided, step-by-step pathway that introduces cybersecurity topics through simplified, age-appropriate explanations.
  • Interactive Quizzes & Practice: Quizlet-style info pages, repeated review opportunities, and scenario-based questions that reinforce learning.
  • Adventure Game Worlds: A progressively challenging map with different themed levels (platformer, puzzle, RPG, etc.), each representing a cybersecurity skill.
  • Final “Boss” Challenge: A culminating mission requiring players to use everything they’ve learned to defeat a simulated cyber threat.
{/* Why We Created CyberSlayers */}

Why We Created CyberSlayers

Today’s children spend more time online than ever, yet most schools provide little to no cybersecurity education. Current solutions focus on restriction or monitoring, not teaching skills.

We asked ourselves:

  • How might we make cybersecurity meaningful, memorable, and fun?
  • How do we teach students not just what to do, but why it matters?
  • How do we ensure kids can recognize digital risks outside the game?

CyberSlayers is our answer — a platform that teaches real-world cybersecurity skills through the power of interactive storytelling.

{/* Our Team */}

Our Team

CyberSlayers is created by a dedicated student team passionate about digital literacy and youth education:

  • Donato Alvarado
  • Colin Clark
  • Osaruese Okungbowa
  • Stephanie Villela
{/* Future of CyberSlayers */}

The Future of CyberSlayers

  • More worlds and story arcs
  • Multiplayer safe practice challenges
  • Parent/teacher dashboards
  • Real-time role-playing scenarios
); }; export default AboutUs;
